SELECT hydbpt.borrow_class AS borrow_type, hydbpt.borrow_name AS borrow_desc, hydb.borrow_nid,
hydb.borrow_nid AS borrow_name,
hb.borrow_apr, CASE WHEN hb.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, hb.borrow_period borrow_period_int, CASE WHEN hb.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN '天' ELSE '个月' END borrow_period_type, CASE WHEN hb.account >= 10000 THEN CASE WHEN hb.account % 10000 = 0 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT((hb.account / 10000), 0), '万' ) WHEN hb.account % 10000 <> 0 AND hb.account % 1000 = 0 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hb.account / 10000, 1), '万' ) WHEN hb.account % 10000 <> 0 AND hb.account % 1000 <> 0 AND hb.account % 100 = 0 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hb.account / 10000, 2), '万' ) WHEN hb.account % 10000 <> 0 AND hb.account % 1000 <> 0 AND hb.account % 100 <> 0 AND hb.account % 10 = 0 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hb.account / 10000, 3), '万' ) ELSE CONCAT( FORMAT(hb.account/ 10000, 4), '万' ) END ELSE CONCAT( FORMAT(hb.account, 0), '元' ) END AS borrow_total, hb.borrow_account_scale AS borrow_schedule, CASE WHEN hb.status = 1 AND hb.verify_status = 3 THEN '10' WHEN hb.status = 2 AND ( hb.verify_time + ( hb.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 *60 ) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP( NOW() ) ) THEN '11' WHEN hb.status = 3 THEN '12' WHEN hb.status = 4 THEN '13'
ELSE '' END AS tstatus, CONCAT(#{host},'?borrowNid=',hydb.borrow_nid) AS borrow_url, CASE WHEN hb.status = 1 AND hb.verify_status =3 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME( hb.ontime, '%m-%d %H:%i' ) ELSE '' END AS on_time, (hydb.borrow_interest_coupon or hydb.borrow_taste_money) as couponEnable, case when hydb.borrow_extra_yield=0 then '' else CONCAT('',hydb.borrow_extra_yield, '%') end borrow_extra_yield, case when hydb.project_type = 4 then 'XSH' when hydb.project_type = 11 then 'ZXH' when hydb.project_type = 13 then 'HJLC' else 'HZT' end project_type_code, IFNULL(hb.borrow_account_wait,0) borrow_account_wait, hydb.increase_interest_flag increase_interest_flag, hydb.borrow_extra_yield borrow_extra_yield_old FROM ht_borrow hydb LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type hydbpt ON hydbpt.borrow_cd = hydb.project_type
ORDER BY hb.status ASC,
hb.borrow_account_scale DESC,
CASE WHEN hb.status = '1' AND hb.verify_status = 3 AND hb.ontime IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(trim(hb.ontime)) > 1 THEN hb.ontime END ASC, CASE WHEN hb.status = '2' THEN hb.borrow_account_scale END DESC, CASE WHEN hb.status = '2' and hb.borrow_account_scale=0 THEN hydb.addtime END DESC, CASE WHEN hb.status = '3' THEN hydb.addtime END DESC, CASE WHEN hb.status = '4' THEN hydb.addtime END DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{limitEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT COUNT(hydb.borrow_nid) AS total FROM ht_borrow hydb LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type hydbpt ON hydbpt.borrow_cd = hydb.project_type

SELECT hydb.disposal_project_name AS borrow_name, hydb.disposal_area AS borrow_address, hydb.disposal_project_type AS borrow_type, hydb.disposal_predictive_value AS guaranty_value, hydb.disposal_ownership_category AS ownership_category, hydb.disposal_asset_origin AS asset_origin, hydb.disposal_attachment_info AS attachment_info FROM ht_borrow hydb WHERE hydb.borrow_nid =#{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT hydb.disposal_price_estimate AS price_estimate, hydb.disposal_period, hydb.disposal_channel,
hydb.disposal_result AS disposal_plan FROM ht_borrow hydb WHERE hydb.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT hydb.borrow_contents, CONCAT( hydbu.province, hydbu.city, hydbu.area ) AS borrow_address, hydb.name as borrow_name, hydbu.industry AS borrow_industry, hydbu.reg_captial, SUBSTRING(FORMAT(hydbu.reg_captial,4),1,LENGTH(FORMAT(hydbu.reg_captial,4))-2) AS reg_captial_format, hydbu.com_reg_time AS regist_time, hydb.account_contents, hydbu.username AS company_name, hydbu.litigation, hydbu.social_credit_code, hydbu.regist_code, hydbu.main_business, hydbu.legal_person, hydbu.overdue_times, hydbu.overdue_amount, hydbu.is_certificate, hydbu.is_operation, hydbu.is_finance, hydbu.is_enterprise_creidt, hydbu.is_legal_person, hydbu.is_asset, hydbu.is_purchase_contract, hydbu.is_supply_contract FROM ht_borrow hydb LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_users hydbu ON hydb.borrow_nid = hydbu.borrow_nid WHERE hydb.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND hydb.company_or_personal = 1
SELECT bca.authen_name, bca.authen_time, '0' AS authen_status FROM ht_borrow_company_authen bca WHERE bca.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY bca.authen_sort_key ASC

SELECT hydb.borrow_measures_instit AS partner, hydb.borrow_company_instruction AS agency_introduction, hydb.borrow_operating_process AS operating_process, hydb.borrow_measures_mea AS control_measures, hydb.borrow_measures_mort AS control_mort FROM ht_borrow hydb WHERE hydb.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT pn.name AS property_type, bh.houses_area AS gross_area, bh.houses_toprice AS guaranty_value, bh.houses_cnt, bh.houses_belong FROM ht_borrow_houses bh LEFT JOIN ht_param_name pn ON bh.houses_type = pn.name_cd AND pn.name_class = 'HOUSES_TYPE' WHERE bh.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT bc.brand AS vehicle_brand, bc.model AS vehicle_model, bc.toprice AS evaluation_price, bc.place FROM ht_borrow_carinfo bc WHERE bc.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT COUNT(hydcl.id) FROM ht_consume_list hydcl LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info hydb ON hydb.consume_id= hydcl.consume_id

SELECT t.* FROM (SELECT hp.id as order_by_id, hp.plan_nid AS plan_nid, hp.plan_name AS plan_name, hp.expect_apr AS expect_apr, CASE WHEN hp.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hp.lock_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hp.lock_period, '个月') END AS lock_period, CASE WHEN hp.plan_invest_status = 1 AND FORMAT(hp.available_invest_account, 2) >= 0.00 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT( hp.available_invest_account / 10000, 2 ), '万' ) WHEN hp.plan_invest_status = 2 THEN '0.00 万' ELSE '0.00 万' END AS available_invest_account, CASE WHEN hp.plan_invest_status = 1 AND FORMAT(hp.available_invest_account, 2) >= 0.00 THEN hp.available_invest_account ELSE 0 END AS order_by_available_invest_account, hp.plan_invest_status AS plan_invest_status, CASE WHEN hp.plan_invest_status = 1 AND FORMAT(hp.available_invest_account, 2) <= 0.00 THEN '稍后开启' WHEN hp.plan_invest_status = 1
THEN '授权服务' WHEN hp.plan_invest_status = 2 THEN '稍后开启' ELSE '' END AS plan_invest_status_name, CASE WHEN hp.plan_invest_status = 1 AND FORMAT(hp.available_invest_account, 2) <= 0.00 THEN 2 WHEN hp.plan_invest_status = 1 THEN 1 WHEN hp.plan_invest_status = 2 THEN 2 ELSE 2 END AS order_by_status_name, CASE WHEN hp.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN hp.lock_period ELSE hp.lock_period * 30 END AS order_by_lock_period, coupon_config FROM ht_hjh_plan hp WHERE hp.del_flag = 0 AND hp.plan_display_status = 1) t
